title: RUBY'S ROUTE 66
description: Vintage Americana vibes - hot rods, diners, sock hops

early_bird.title: The Early Bird Cruiser
early_bird.description: Mellow morning tracks with that golden hour glow. Think coffee shop meets convertible top down, perfect for sunrise drives through small towns.
early_bird.samples: "Blue Moon" by The Marcels, "Dog Days Are Over" by Florence + The Machine, "California Gurls" by The Mamas & The Papas

truck_stop.title: Truck Stop Coffee
truck_stop.description: Rugged, no-nonsense tracks with a working-class soul. Gritty vocals and steady rhythms for when you need that caffeine kick in musical form.
truck_stop.samples: "Born to Be Wild" by Steppenwolf, "Seven Nation Army" by The White Stripes, "Folsom Prison Blues" by Johnny Cash

jukebox.title: The Jukebox Special
jukebox.description: Pure sock hop energy with irresistible hooks. The kind of songs that make you want to dance on checkered floors under neon lights.
jukebox.samples: "Rock Around the Clock" by Bill Haley, "Valerie" by Amy Winehouse, "Johnny B. Goode" by Chuck Berry
